# Mandelbrot + Nighthawk overlay generator (simplified)
def mandelbrot(h, w, max_iter, zoom, offset):
    y, x = np.ogrid[1.4:-1.4:h*1j, -2:2:w*1j]
    c = x + y*1j
    c = offset + (c - offset) / zoom
    z = c
    divtime = max_iter + np.zeros(z.shape, dtype=int)
    for i in range(max_iter):
        mask = np.abs(z) <= 2
        z[mask] = z[mask]**2 + c[mask]
        divtime[mask & (divtime==0)] = i
    return divtime

# Usage: generate 108 frames, overlay polygon as "Nighthawk"
